subject: Olympic Games
Decisions and Verdicts
lead_paragraph: Oscar Pistorius, a double-amputee runner, won the right to compete for a spot in the Beijing Games. And I find myself applauding the narrow one-case judgment of the court.
snippet: Oscar Pistorius, a double-amputee runner, won the right to compete for a spot in the Beijing Games. And I find myself applauding the narrow one-case judgment of the court.
